name: Sweltura
description:
Sweltura was developed as an entry for Ludum Dare #40 and designed around the theme "The More You Have, the Worse It Is ". Use the tools at your disposal to help keep a frog moist and focused on their hopeless trek through the desert!

Controls 
• Mouse Wheel: Cycle Tools (Eyedropper -> Spray -> Stick)
• Left-Click: Use Tool
• 1 Key: Eyedropper
• 2 Key: Spray
• 3 Key: Stick
